name: Flappy Smash Party - New Season Open
name_original: Flappy Smash Party - New Season Open
description:
Things get better with time!

Come join our little friend as he takes on his next mission of flapping.

Benefit from

** 11 New Birds to match your style!

** 3 boosts to help you get that little bit further!

** 7 Gadgets that will make the game alot easier , or dare we say it LOT HARDER to play from making teh pipes have random gap sizes, to having fog to make flight super hard!

** [ How to play ] **

Tap to flap, dont hit the pipes

Be the best you can be, and beat your friends!
